entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: President Trump and First Lady Melania visit the Taj Mahal
entity.description: The US president began his first two-day India visit in Ahmedabad where he joined Prime Minister Narendra Modi in opening the world's biggest cricket stadium. He is accompanied by First Lady Melania, daughter Ivanka and son-in-law Jared Kushner. The president then flew to Uttar Pradesh to visit the iconic Taj Mahal at sunset.

text: @realDonaldTrump Your HHS just spread COVID19 all along the I5 corridor--that's what you did! My state took immediate actions and not based upon religious ideologies! Other states did as well and you were in India eating with a tryrant-
